TopicTitle: WANTED: A Piano/keyboard player willing to help with a video.

Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I want to make a new video celebrating the addition of Valentina to the crew and I think I found the perfect song, but I can't find a good lyric-free(and free-use) arrangement for it.

So if anyone could record or digitally create a simple backing track to it I would be grateful!

The song is

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/n4zRe_wvJw8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

An abridged/simpler version would be easier if possible, like[this parody](https://youtu.be/N-jcUXJj-cs) did for skyrim.

Thanks in advance!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T17:04:29Z" title="05/02/2015 05:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by Xacktar**
